Title: Ancient Curiosity: Combat
Description: <You hold the relic and discover a shimmering glow emanating from it. This looks important. The Explorers' League would be interested in this.>
ObjectivesText: Use and equip the Unbreakable Iron Idol to Brann Bronzebeard.

Objectives.Text: Add the Unbreakable Iron Idol to your collection
Equip the Unbreakable Iron Idol to your companion
